completeListOfAbilities.name: Snatch Shot
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit group ranged  PG attack + single-target  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Often steals 1 random buff from targets
Self: 8 turns 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)
Grants 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Becomes Snatch Shot+ with 3 levels of Way of the Sky Pirate
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Way of the Sky Pirate active

completeListOfAbilities.name: Snatch Shot+
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
4-hit group ranged  PG attack + single-target  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Often steals 1 random buff from targets
Self: 8 turns 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)
Grants 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Way of the Sky Pirate active

passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD with active buffs

passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Great Aim

passives.name: Charged Snatch Shot

passives.short_desc: Charged Snatch Shot: Raises use count of Snatch Shot

passives.name: Charged Great Aim
passives.desc: Great Aim use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Great Aim: Raises use count of Great Aim

passives.name: Buff Collector
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV with 2 or more active buffs

passives.name: The Fleetfooted
passives.desc: When using BRV Attackã€? BRV Attack+:\n â€¢ Low chance 2 turns SPD Down I to targetã€? 2 turns slightly increased SPD to self
passives.short_desc: The Fleetfooted: Inflicts SPD Downã€? raises own SPD

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATKã€? SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATKã€? SPD

passives.name: Snatch Shot Extension
passives.desc:
Snatch Shot use +2

When using Snatch Shot:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; becomes group attack
 â€¢ Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 â€¢ Moderately increased buff steal rate
 â€¢ Self: 8 turns 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)
 â€¢ Raises Way of the Sky Pirate 1 level when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack on target after use

While 3 levels of Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 â€¢ Snatch Shot becomes Snatch Shot+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

While Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Way of the Sky Pirate level by 1; occasionally steals 1 random buff from target)
passives.short_desc: Snatch Shot Extension: Boost to Snatch Shot

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs

passives.name: Great Aim Extension
passives.desc:
Great Aim use +4

When using Great Aim:
 â€¢ Slightly increased buff steal rate
 â€¢ Slightly increased BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Additional ranged  PG attack after BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Self: 8 turns 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)
 â€¢ Raises Way of the Sky Pirate 1 level when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

While 3 levels of Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 â€¢ Great Aim becomes Great Aim+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Great Aim Extension: Boost to Great Aim

passive.desc:

 â€¢ Stolen buff duration+
passive.short_desc: Pirate's Soul: Boost to Snatch Shot

passive.desc:

 â€¢ Increased BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Removes 3 debuffs from self in order inflicted
 â€¢ Buff steal rate+
 â€¢ Steals 2 more buffs
 â€¢ Stolen buff duration+
passive.short_desc: Liberty Call: Boost to Great Aim
